name: Casino Roulette Table
description:
Added daily bonus!!!
WITH NEW BETS!!!

Roulette - the most common game in casino. Excitement, the dynamics of games, fantastic prizes - all of this is based on its popularity around the world. It is attributed to various magical properties, the relationship with the devil, felt the finger of fate, etc. Maybe they are right - the sum of the numbers on the wheel = 666.
Do not lose your head and just enjoy the game.
The rules are very simple: you put the chips of different value in the area of playing field and expect to drop the ball, which will specify the winning number.
We hope our software will give you a lot of fun.
Enjoy the game!
